means: 吃饭，进餐( dine的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She checked the seating arrangements before the guests filed into the dining-room.
sentence.Network_cn: 在客人们鱼贯进入餐厅之前，她核实了一遍座位安排。

sentence.Network_en: The dining room has lakeside views and offers excellent cuisine.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那家饭店用餐能欣赏到湖边景色，而且那里饭菜也是美味佳肴。

sentence.Network_en: One of his jobs was supervising the dining room.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的工作之一是管理餐厅。

entry.def: When you dine, you have dinner.

example.tran: 大多数晚上他都是一个人用餐。

example.ex: That night the two men dined at Wilson's club...
example.tran: 那天晚上这两个男人在威尔逊俱乐部进了餐。

Sentence.sentence: As you can see from the drawings, the kitchen has one door into the dining room, another into the family room and a third to the outside.
